src_original: ṣaḍ vivādamūlāni caturdaśa bhedakarāṇī vastūni  (A 336b) ṣaḍ vivādamūlāni katamāni?
tgt_original: 六諍根法者，云何為六？ 答：

src_original: yathāpīhaikaḥ krodhano bhavati upanāhī;  yo 'sau krodhano bhavaty upanāhī śāstāraṃ na satkaroti na gurukaroti na mānayati na pūjayati;  śāstāram asatkurvann agurukurvann amānayann apūjayan dharmaṃ na pāśyati;
tgt_original: 謂有一類有忿有恨、若有忿恨，便於大師不能恭敬供養尊重讚歎。

src_original: dharmam apaśyan śrāmaṇyanirapekṣo bhavati;  śrāmaṇyanirapekṣaḥ saṃghe tadrūpaṃ raṇam utpādayati kalahabhaṇḍanavigrahavivādam;
tgt_original: 若於大師不能恭敬供養尊重讚歎即不見法，若不見法即不顧沙門，若不顧沙門便起染著輕弄鬪諍。

src_original: yaḥ syāt kalahabhaṇḍanavigrahavivādo bahujanānarthāya bahujanāhitāya bhahujanaduḥkhāya anarthāyāhitāya duḥkhāya devamanuṣyāṇām;
tgt_original: 由起染著輕弄鬪諍為所依止令多眾生無義無利受諸苦惱，由此能引無量天人無義無利諸苦惱事。

src_original: evaṃrūpaṃ saced yūyaṃ bhikṣavo vivādamūlam adhyātmaṃ bahirdhā vāprahīṇaṃ samanupaśyatha  tatra vaḥ sahitaiḥ samagraiḥ saṃmodamānair avivādamānaiḥ tīvrachando vīryaṃ vyāyāma
tgt_original: 如是諍根汝等若見，或內或外有所未斷，即應聚集和合精勤方便求斷無得放逸。

src_original: evaṃrūpaṃ saced yūyaṃ bhikṣavo vivādamūlam adhyātmaṃ bahirdhā vā prahīṇaṃ samanupaśyatha  tatra vaḥ sahitaiḥ samagraiḥ saṃmodamānair avivādamānais tīvrachando vīryaṃ vyāyāma  utsāha utsūḍhir aprativāṇismṛtyā saṃprajanye yogaḥ karaṇīya yāvad etasyaiva vivādamūlasya  prahīṇasyāyatyām anavāsravāya;  evaṃ vas (Adhik-v 73)  tad vivādamūlaṃ samyaksusamavahitam āyatyāṃ notpatsyate;
tgt_original: 汝等若見或內或外皆悉已斷，即應發起正念正知猛利之心精勤防護，令當來世永不復起，是為正斷善斷諍根。

src_original: yathā krodhana upanāhī mrakṣaḥ pradāsi īrṣyako matsarī śaṭho māyāvī ahrīyamāṇo 'napatrāpī pāpeccho mithyādṛṣṭikaḥ;
tgt_original: 如有忿恨、若有覆惱、若有嫉慳、若有誑諂、若有邪見倒見，廣說亦爾。

src_original: punar aparam ihaikaḥ svayaṃ dṛṣṭiparāmarśī bhavaty asamañjasagrāhī duṣpratiniḥsargamantrī;
tgt_original: 復有一類取著自見，起堅固執難教棄捨。

src_original: yaḥ svayaṃ dṛṣṭiparāmarśī bhavati duṣprajñaniḥsargamantrī sa śāstāraṃ na satkaroti na gurukaroti na mānayati na pūjayai;
tgt_original: 若取著自見起堅固執難教棄捨，便於大師不能恭敬供養尊重讚歎。

src_original: śāstāram asatkurvann agurukurvann amānayann apūjayan dharmaṃ na paśyati;  dharmam apaśyan śrāmaṇyanirapekṣo bhavati;  śrāmaṇyanirapekṣaḥ sa saṃghe tadrūpaṃ raṇam utpādayati kalahabhaṇḍanavigrahavivādam;  yaḥ syāt kalahabhaṇḍanavigrahavivādo bahujanānarthāya bahujanāhitāya bahujanaduḥkhāya anarthāyāhitāya ḥduḥkhāyaḥ devamanuṣyāṇām;
tgt_original: 若於大師不能恭敬供養尊重讚歎即不見法，若不見法即不顧沙門，若不顧沙門便起染著輕弄鬪諍，由起染著輕弄鬪諍為所依止令多眾生無義無利受諸苦惱，由此能引無量天人無義無利諸苦惱事。

src_original: evaṃrūpaṃ saced yūyaṃ bhikṣavo vivādamūlam adhyātmaṃ vā bahirdhā vā aprahīṇaṃ samanupaśyatha
tgt_original: 如是諍根，汝等若見或內或外有所未斷，即應聚集和合精勤方便求斷無得放逸。 汝等應使如是諍根無餘斷滅，如先未起如是諍根。

src_original: tatra vaḥ sahitaiḥ samagraiḥ saṃmodamānair avivādamānais tīvracchando vīryavṃ vyāyāma  utsāha utsūḍhir aprativāṇismṛtyā saṃprajanye yogaḥ karaṇīyo yāvad etasyaiva vivādamūlasya  utpannasya prahāṇāya;  evaṃ vas tad vivādamūlam  prahāsyati;  evaṃrūpaṃ saced yūyaṃ bhikṣavo vivādamūlam adhyātmaṃ vā bahirdhā vā prahīṇaṃ samanupaśyatha
